Name: Estonian Archives in Australia, Library, Archives and Information Centre

About.Hours & facilities: Wed 10am-3pm or by appointment - on Wednesdays, telephone Estonia House on (02) 9212 2113.

About.Major holdings: Records of Estonian organisations in NSW, SA, WA, ACT. Meie Kodu newspaper 1949- ; newspapers published in Estonian world wide 1944- ; newspapers and periodicals published in Estonia pre 1944. Scholarly reprints by Estonian scholars world wide. Einsaar/Mielen family papers, Kristof Kaldma archive. Printed material from displaced persons camps in Germany 1944-1952.

Contact.Street address: Estonian House, 141 Campbell Street, Surry Hills NSW 2010
